description: This file defines an interface 'IAppManager' within the WPEFramework project, specifying methods, notifications, and properties for managing applications, their lifecycle, and events related to app installation, uninstallation, state changes, and messaging.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for application management, providing methods for registering notifications, launching, loading, closing, and retrieving information about applications, as well as configuring app-related properties.

classes.name: IAppManager::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface defining callbacks for app installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for app events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves the list of launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves the list of currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to an application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a running application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a running application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears application data.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specific application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for an app.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Gets a property of an app.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property for an app.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Gets the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
